name: DGCP MaMeeFarm Proof 439 — Morning Temperature Check
description:
Morning temperature and humidity measurement recorded at MaMeeFarm
before starting daily farm activities.

The image documents environmental conditions at the farm using a digital
thermo-hygrometer mounted on a brick wall.

Timestamp and watermark are embedded directly in the image.


DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
